tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited Dr. Vora to consult him on getting my wisdom teeth extracted. Everything, from the consultation to the actual extraction was incredibly smooth. Dr. Vora took the time to explain the condition of my teeth and the most ideal course of action. The entire extraction process took less than 10 minutes and I've felt no pain at all. I was allowed to get back to my daily routine the day after. 

If you're someone reading the reviews because you have dental issues and are nervous, trust me you're in great hands. Definitely recommend Dr. Vora to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I never knew about the dental scopey. He is the one, who made me understand about the measurement with the help of camera.
The possible solutions were very well explained to me...well enough to make a decision...the doctor was meticulously and simplied the explanation...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Doc Sheel around Feb 2020 to get braces as my wedding was planned for year end. So I hardly had few months and everyone was unsure if it can be done in this short span. However I was assured by DrSheel that it can be planned and completed on or before time and there is no worry. He explained everything in detail and educated me about every little thing and what would best suit me which made me comfortable. Even though the lockdown was imposed right after my treatment started we could manage to complete the treatment well before time. All thanks to Dr Sheel I could smile laugh without any hesitation and look beautiful on my special day !
Reached the clinic at 1pm as per my appointment but receptionist informed me he isn't available till 2:30pm. No respect for patients valueable time. Very Bad experience.
reply_text:
Sir , we believe you had booked an online appointment with us. As per practo's policy we need to confirm the appointment via their automated call once an appointment is booked with us. As the doctor had to attend an emergency case at other clinic we had not confirmed the appointment with practo.

And as soon as the doctor was available we contacted you. We value your time but also do kindly understand the doctor was attending another patient in need. Wishing you the best of health.
Regards,
Dr.Vora's Dental Care Centre

review: My family and myself trust doctor completely. We have been visiting Dr Rashmi Vora for all our tooth complaints since 27 yrs.A man of complete integrity ,soft spoken ,kind and so respectful.And like father like son.Dr Sheel vora,an expert in implants  .he did an extraction and implant for my husband with utmost perfection. IF you are looking for a dentist who genuinely cares for your teeth then visit him at all costs.Strongly recommended. GOD BLESS THEM BOTH.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was really nice to see that Dr. ShEEL was a very humble and at the same time perfect in his job. He explained me my dental condition and the treatment needed as well as the other assistant staff were also very cooperative.. I enjoyed my experience and will Surely recommend Dr. SHEEL to my friends and colleagues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to him as to take a second opinion on wisdom tooth extraction. This was my first tooth extraction/ dental procedure and I was little scared. But he made things super easy . He explained all the anomalies, even gave an overview via 3D CT Scan image of my dental alignment issues and how to go about it , which were otherwise neglected/ never marked by anyone . 

Later the tooth extraction went super smooth , quick and pain free procedure. He is very friendly and supportive which creates the trust factor between patient- doctor and you can rely on him for the procedures.
